verses.verse: Why do the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> <S%H7283>rage<s%>, and the <S%H3816>people<s%> <S%H1897>imagine<s%> a vain <S%H7385>thing<s%>? rage: or, tumultuously assemble imagine: Heb. meditate

The <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3320>set<s%> themselves, and the <S%H7336>rulers<s%> take <S%H3245>counsel<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and against his <S%H4899>anointed<s%>, saying,
Let us <S%H5423>break<s%> their <S%H4147>bands<s%> <S%H5423>asunder<s%>, and cast <S%H7993>away<s%> their <S%H5688>cords<s%> from us.
He that <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> shall <S%H7832>laugh<s%>: the <S%H136>Lord<s%> shall have them in <S%H3932>derision<s%>.
Then shall he <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto them in his <S%H639>wrath<s%>, and <S%H926>vex<s%> them in his sore <S%H2740>displeasure<s%>. vex: or, trouble
Yet have I <S%H5258>set<s%> my <S%H4428>king<s%> upon my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>hill<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>. set: Heb. anointed upon: Heb. upon Zion, the hill of my holiness

I will <S%H5608>declare<s%> the <S%H2706>decree<s%>: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, Thou art my <S%H1121>Son<s%>; this <S%H3117>day<s%> have I <S%H3205>begotten<s%> thee. the decree: or, for a decree

<S%H7592>Ask<s%> of me, and I shall <S%H5414>give<s%> thee the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> for thine <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, and the uttermost <S%H657>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> for thy <S%H272>possession<s%>.
Thou shalt <S%H7489>break<s%> them with a <S%H7626>rod<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>; thou shalt dash them in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> like a <S%H3335>potter's<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%>.
Be <S%H7919>wise<s%> now therefore, O ye <S%H4428>kings<s%>: be <S%H3256>instructed<s%>, ye <S%H8199>judges<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

<S%H5401>Kiss<s%> the <S%H1248>Son<s%>, lest he be <S%H599>angry<s%>, and ye <S%H6>perish<s%> from the <S%H1870>way<s%>, when his <S%H639>wrath<s%> is <S%H1197>kindled<s%> but a <S%H4592>little<s%>. <S%H835>Blessed<s%> are all they that put their <S%H2620>trust<s%> in him.
